title: PBE Error 500
body: > It seems that whenever I try to sign up for the PBE and hit the "I want to help" button the page takes forever to load. And when it finally does load it has iBlitzcrank with a big error sign on his chest and up above, it says Error 500. I've already tried both Cyber Ghost and Hotspot shield, is there anyone who can help me fix this.

replies.body: There's been a few reports on this and we'd like to take a closer look.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can check it out.  We'll reply back asap!
